doctor.name: Dr. Mustafizur Rahman Masum
doctor.info: Dr. Mustafizur Rahman Masum is a Pediatric Surgeon in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Pediatric Surgery). He is a Assistant Professor & Head, Pediatric Surgery at Barind Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at City Diagnostic Center, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Mustafizur Rahman Masum at City Diagnostic Center, Pabna is 10am to 7pm (Fri & Sat), 4pm to 8pm (Mon & Thu).

chamber.address: Beside TB Hospital, Hospital Road, Shalgaria, Pabna

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Ashekin Abir
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Ashekin Abir is a Pediatric Surgeon in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Pediatric Surgery). He is a Medical Officer (Surgery) at 250 Bedded General Hospital, Pabna. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shafique Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Ashekin Abir at Shafique Hospital, Pabna is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Khairul Tower, Narikel Bagan Road, Kalachad Para, Pabna
